title: Earrings with Two Wheel Ornaments
description: Gold earrings. Loop a gold tube tapering at the ends, fastened by 2 loops; the lower loop is surrounded by a beaded wire forming spirals at the sides (one broken). On front face a small disc and 2 pellets. Attached to rim 2 rings of tubular and beaded wire, with triangular groups of pellets around rim; point of junction of loop and ring concealed by coarse pellets and flattened pellets.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.
